description: We have 4 items. Each item has a value and a weight. The values are [10, 20, 15, 25] and the weights are [2, 4, 3, 5]. We can carry at most 8 units of weight. Choose which items to take to maximize total value. Each item can be taken at most once.

Capacity.definition: Maximum total weight we can carry

objective.description: "The goal is to maximize the total value of items selected while staying within the weight capacity constraint"
objective.code:
from gurobipy import quicksum

model.setObjective(quicksum(ItemValue[i] * itemTaken[i] for i in range(NumberOfItems)), GRB.MAXIMIZE)

constraints.description: Sum of weights of all items taken should not exceed the maximum weight capacity
constraints.code: model.addConstr(sum(ItemWeight[i] * itemTaken[i] for i in range(NumberOfItems)) <= Capacity)

itemTaken.definition: Binary variable indicating whether each item is taken (1) or not taken (0)
